name: Kisan Arthik Sahayata Yojana
description: Our company is dedicated to providing financial aid to farmers through the Kisan Arthik Sahayata Yojana, supporting the agricultural community in times of need.
eligibility: Available for all farmers facing financial distress. No landholding restrictions. Aadhaar and a linked bank account are mandatory.

name: Krishi Rin Mukti Yojana
description: Introducing the Krishi Rin Mukti Yojana, our initiative to alleviate farmers from financial burdens by providing debt relief and assistance.
eligibility: Open to farmers with outstanding loans. No landholding restrictions. Aadhaar and a linked bank account are mandatory.

name: Samriddhi Kisan Nidhi Yojana
description: Our organization introduces the Samriddhi Kisan Nidhi Yojana, a financial assistance program aimed at promoting the prosperity of farmers across the nation.
eligibility: Available for all farmers facing financial challenges. No landholding restrictions. Aadhaar and a linked bank account are mandatory.

name: Kisan Sahayata Suraksha Yojana
description: In our commitment to the welfare of farmers, we present the Kisan Sahayata Suraksha Yojana, offering financial support and security to farmers in need.
eligibility: Available for all farmers facing financial hardships. No landholding restrictions. Aadhaar and a linked bank account are mandatory.

name: Kisan Rin Harek Suraksha Yojana
description: The Kisan Rin Harek Suraksha Yojana is our initiative to provide financial aid and security to farmers facing challenges and debt.
eligibility: Open to farmers with outstanding loans and financial difficulties. No landholding restrictions. Aadhaar and a linked bank account are mandatory.

name: Kisan Kalyan Sahayata Yojana
description: The Kisan Kalyan Sahayata Yojana is our commitment to the well-being of farmers, providing financial assistance to overcome challenges and promote prosperity.
eligibility: Available for all farmers facing financial distress. No landholding restrictions. Aadhaar and a linked bank account are mandatory.

name: Annapurna Kisan Rin Suraksha Yojana
description: We introduce the Annapurna Kisan Rin Suraksha Yojana, our initiative to provide debt relief and financial security to farmers in need.
eligibility: Open to farmers with outstanding loans and financial challenges. No landholding restrictions. Aadhaar and a linked bank account are mandatory.

name: Kisan Suraksha Rin Yojana

eligibility: Available for all farmers with outstanding loans and financial hardships. No landholding restrictions. Aadhaar and a linked bank account are mandatory.
